org.datanon.CryptoPAn

Class CryptoPAn

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.datanon.CryptoPAn.CryptoPAn

  • public class CryptoPAn
extends java.lang.Object
    CryptoPAn class for ip address anonymization, the class provides not only CryptoPAn itself, but only the combination of CryptoPAn and times. Also, this class provides both String format ip address and integer format ip address for the convenience of computation.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Junjie Zhou

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CryptoPAn(byte[] key)
      Initialize CryptoPAn, after this step block cipher and padding are prepared.
      CryptoPAn(java.lang.String key)
      Initialize CryptoPAn object with String type key.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int forward(int ip, int times)
      Positively CryptoPAn given ip(in the form of 32 bits integer) according to given times.
      java.lang.String forward(java.lang.String ip)
      Positively CryptoPAn given ip(in the form of String).
      int reverse(int ip, int times)
      Reversly CryptoPAn given ip(in the form of 32 bits integer) according to given times.
      java.lang.String reverse(java.lang.String ip)
      Reversly CryptoPAn given ip(in the form of String) to its original appearance.

      • CryptoPAn

        public CryptoPAn(java.lang.String key)
          throws CryptoPAnRunTimeException,
                 javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException,
                 javax.crypto.BadPaddingException,
                 java.security.InvalidKeyException,
                 java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                 javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException
        Initialize CryptoPAn object with String type key.
        Parameters:
        key - String type, 32 single-byte words in UTF8.
        Throws:
        CryptoPAnRunTimeException
        javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException
        javax.crypto.BadPaddingException
        java.security.InvalidKeyException
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException

      • CryptoPAn

        public CryptoPAn(byte[] key)
          throws CryptoPAnRunTimeException,
                 javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException,
                 javax.crypto.BadPaddingException,
                 java.security.InvalidKeyException,
                 java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                 javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException
        Initialize CryptoPAn, after this step block cipher and padding are prepared.
        Parameters:
        key - Byte vector with its length being 32.
        Throws:
        CryptoPAnRunTimeException
        javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException
        javax.crypto.BadPaddingException
        java.security.InvalidKeyException
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException

    • Method Detail

      • forward

        public int forward(int ip,
                   int times)
            throws javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException,
                   javax.crypto.BadPaddingException
        Positively CryptoPAn given ip(in the form of 32 bits integer) according to given times.
        Parameters:
        ip - Given ip in the form of 32 bits integer.
        times - Given times for CryptoPAn.
        Returns:
        Anonymized ip address(in the form of 32 bits integer) after given times' CryptoPAn.
        Throws:
        javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException
        javax.crypto.BadPaddingException

      • reverse

        public int reverse(int ip,
                   int times)
            throws javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException,
                   javax.crypto.BadPaddingException
        Reversly CryptoPAn given ip(in the form of 32 bits integer) according to given times.
        Parameters:
        ip - Given ip in the form of 32 bits integer.
        times - Given times for CryptoPAn.
        Returns:
        Ip address(in the form of 32 bits integer) after given times' reverse CryptoPAn.
        Throws:
        javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException
        javax.crypto.BadPaddingException

                         throws CryptoPAnRunTimeException,

        Parameters:

      • reverse

        public java.lang.String reverse(java.lang.String ip)
                         throws CryptoPAnRunTimeException,
                                javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException,
                                javax.crypto.BadPaddingException
        Reversly CryptoPAn given ip(in the form of String) to its original appearance.
        Parameters:
        ip - Given ip in the form of String.
        Returns:
        Original ip address(in the form of String).
        Throws:
        CryptoPAnRunTimeException
        javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException
        javax.crypto.BadPaddingException
